entry.title: 3M 3HA - Fire Barrier Cast-in-Device Height Adapter 3 in 7000133837
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Fire Barriers
Price: 11.08

[shortdesc]

3M Fire Barrier Cast-in Device Height Adaptor, 3HA, 3 in (7.6 cm)

  • The 3M™ Fire Barrier Cast-In Device Height Adaptor 3HA is to be used in conjunction with a 3 inch (76.2) 3M™ Fire Barrier Cast-In Device
  • It increases the height of allowable concrete thicknesses by 4 inches (101.6 mm) for installations requiring up to 12 inches (304.8 mm) pour depths.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Fire Rating 3 Hour
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Fire Barriers

    Extra Product Information

  • The 3M™ Fire Barrier Cast-In Device Height Adaptor accommodates both metallic and non-metallic models of 3M™ Fire Barrier Cast-In Device
  • This height adapter snaps easily onto device, and the device is then secured to metal deck (see system details for in

    • Product Information

  • Firestop tested for up to 3 hours, when used in conjunction with the appropriate 3M™ Fire Barrier Cast-In Device, in accordance with ASTM E 814 (UL 1479)
  • Adds up to 4 inches (101.6 mm) to height of device
  • For special applications, can be modified to accommodate larger depths of concrete pour
  • UL Classified, universally recognized independent test agency
  • Factory made, helps assure consistent quality
  • Red colour easily identifiable as fire-rated

    • Suggested Application

  • Typically used in new installations when the concrete slab thickness will be greater than 8 inches (203.2 mm)
